api_list.name: getOrderById
api_list.description: For valid response try integer IDs with value <= 5 or > 10. Other values will generate exceptions.

required_parameters.name: orderId
required_parameters.description: ID of order that needs to be fetched

api_list.name: getPetById
getInventory
api_list.description: Returns a map of status codes to quantities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://petstore158.p.rapidapi.com/store/inventory"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "petstore158.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: logoutUser

import requests

url = "https://petstore158.p.rapidapi.com/user/logout"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "petstore158.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
